body.name: Itzy Ritzy Natural Rubber Pacifiers, Set of 2 – Natural Rubber Newborn Pacifiers with Cherry-Shaped Nipple & Large Air Holes for Added Safety; Set of 2 in Coconut & Toast, Ages 0 – 6 Months

features: NEWBORN PACIFIERS 0-6 MONTHS: Immerse your little one in comfort with our Natural Rubber Pacifiers. Specifically designed for babies aged 0-6 months, these feature a cherry-shaped nipple that closely mimics breastfeeding for a soothing experience.

CHIC STYLE & SAFETY: Each natural rubber pacifier includes a shield with large air holes that is accented with a cable-style handle, adding a touch of fashion while meeting ASTM safety standards. Our pacifiers are also BPA-free and PVC-free.

SET OF 2 INFANT PACIFIERS: Each pack includes 2 pacifiers in 2 coordinating shades. At Itzy Ritzy, we offer not just pacifiers but an essential accessory that complements your newborn baby essentials with both style and functionality.

BEST PACIFIER FOR BREASTFED BABIES: Mimic the comforting feel of breastfeeding. The natural rubber nipple provides a nurturing touch, making these pacifiers an ideal choice for newborns, for a seamless transition & soothing experience.

ITZY RITZY NEWBORN ESSENTIALS: Discover our trusted baby essentials. These chic pacifiers for babies aged 0-6 months meet safety standards while adding a stylish flair to your baby's accessories. Secure and essential for your little one's early stages.
body.description: Are you searching for the perfect pacifier that combines safety, style, and comfort for your little one? Look no further than Itzy Ritzy Natural Rubber Pacifiers – a delightful blend of functionality and fashion. Picture this: a soothing pacifier designed for newborns aged 0-6 months, crafted with a natural rubber nipple that mimics the comforting feel of breastfeeding. What sets it apart? The benefits of natural rubber, offering not only a gentle touch but also a cherry-shaped nipple to mimic the feel of breastfeeding. Our natural rubber pacifiers feature a shield with large air holes and meet ASTM safety standards. And that's not all – the pacifier boasts a unique cable design detail on the plastic handle, adding a touch of chic style to the equation. Say goodbye to worries and hello to peace of mind, as these chic pacifiers are BPA-free and PVC-free, elevating your baby's essentials with a secure, stylish, and naturally soothing solution. Make each moment comforting and chic with Itzy Ritzy's Natural Rubber Pacifiers – where safety meets style in perfect harmony for your little one's early stages.

productInformation.name: Care instructions
productInformation.value: ‎Before first use place in boiling water for 5 minutes. Watch that the pacifier is not touching the bottom of the pot. Remove, allow to cool and squeeze any water from the nipple. Clean before each use in warm water with mild soap. Rinse thoroughly with clean water. Do not clean with abrasive cleaning agents. Not suitable for dishwasher, microwave or sterilizer.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: About Our Brand At Itzy Ritzy, we're not just a brand; we're parents too. Founded by Kelly and Brian while navigating the adventure of raising three little ones, we get the highs, lows, and everything in between. From day one, our commitment has been to real parents like you, offering chic, quality products. Embrace the Itzy Ritzy experience—a journey of love, support, and unmatched style for every parent. Itzy Ritzy Natural Rubber Itzy Soother Pacifiers Natural Rubber Nipple Closely Mimics Breastfeeding Help soothe your sweetie in style with these adorable natural rubber pacifiers! Each natural rubber pacifier nipple is cherry-shaped to closely mimic breastfeeding, and the handle on each natural rubber pacifier is accented with a cable detail. Our pacifiers meet ASTM safety standards and are BPA free. The natural rubber nipple on our Itzy Soother pacifiers is cherry-shaped to closely mimic the feel of breastfeeding. The handle of each pacifier features precious cable detailing. Sold as a 2-pack of coordinating pacifiers. Designed for ages 0 - 6 months.

Large Air Holes Ensuring your baby's safety and comfort is our top priority. That's why each Itzy Soother Natural Rubber Pacifier comes equipped with a shield featuring strategically placed large air holes. Natural Rubber Nipple Our thoughtfully designed cherry-shaped natural rubber nipple is designed to closely mimic the feel of breastfeeding. It ensures a gentle and familiar experience for your baby, making transitions between breastfeeding and pacifier use a breeze. Cable Accent on Handle Our pacifier not only prioritizes comfort but also adds a touch of trendiness with a chic cable accent on the handle. The fashionable cable design not only makes a statement but also provides a secure grip for both baby and parent alike.

Trust in the thoughtful design and quality craftsmanship of the Itzy Ritzy Soother Pacifier to provide your baby with the utmost comfort and safety during those precious early months. Embrace a pacifier that goes beyond soothing—choose the Itzy Soother Natural Rubber Pacifier for a gentle, comforting, and amazing experience for your little bundle of joy.

Natural Rubber Pacifiers, Set of 2 Sweetie Soother Silicone Pacifiers, Set of 2 Silicone Pacifier and Lovey Set Silicone Pacifier Clip Pacifier Case With Clip Clear Pacifier Case With Handle Material Natural rubber 100% Food Grade Silicone 100% Food Grade Silicone, Polyester 100% food grade silicone with metal clip Vegan Leather PVC (non-phthalate) and Polyester strap Features Newborn rubber pacifiers for ages 0-6 months. Cherry-shaped natural rubber nipple closely mimics the feel of breastfeeding. Large air holes for added safety. Newborn pacifiers for 0-6 months. Available in packs of 2. Each pacifier features a trendy design element on the handle. Each lovey character is soft and machine-washable. The included Sweetie Soother pacifier is 100% food grade silicone and top rack dishwasher safe. Set includes one silicone pacifier and one lovey. One-piece design & silicone cord. Keeps pacifiers, teethers & small toys in place. Perfect size for storing two pacifiers, change, lip balm, ear buds, mini hand sanitizer, or small sets of keys. Keeps pacifiers clean and close. Easily attaches to a diaper bag or stroller. Clear design for easy organization. BPA free & phthalate free.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Durable and well made
reviews.reviewText: Got a pack of these for my daughter when she was first born. We loved them so much we got a 2nd pack. They are a nice light weight so it’s not pulling on their mouth. They’re durable (I’m not worried about the nipple coming off and becoming a choking hazard) and well made. The plastic part is slightly bowed so it doesn’t lay flat against the face which I like both for better representing a breast (good sucking technique) and because it means it’s not pressed against her nose. They are east to clean and made of a nice soft rubber. Plus, they’re cute!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Only pacifier baby will take!
reviews.reviewText: I had tried at least 7 different types of pacifiers or more and my baby refused all of them. She'd gag and whip them out of her mouth with her little hands. I bought these pacifiers on a whim when I saw they were discounted as a last ditch effort, but our baby actually loves them! Saves me from hours of being her pacifier like I had been doing before when she was full but still needed to suck for soothing. Plus they're super cute!Only thing that could become a negative is I noticed after sanitizing in boiling water that the bulb does fill with some water. It squeezed out easily, but I'm keeping an eye out for mold growth in there. So far no issues though!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I used an oblong Bibs pacifier for my little guy until he was 5 months because this one smashed his nose + somehow didn’t want to stay in very well. When he started teething, he started with a rash around his mouth due to the trapped moisture so I switched over to this one. We both love it now! His rash cleared up immediately + he made no fuss about the change in nipples. Plus these are way cuter! I love how the neutral colors coordinate with all of his outfits. I would totally buy again!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Shorter than BIBS
reviews.reviewText: I originally bought these in hope that they would be dupe for the BIBS pacifier. If you have a picky baby and are tryna find a cheaper dupe for the BIBS pacifier they will be able to tell. These pacis are shorter than the bibs paci. They are nice quality tho just not a fit for my little one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My baby's favorite pacifier
reviews.reviewText: These pacifiers are the only ones that my baby will take from the start. We tried so many different pacifiers, but these have always remained superior. As all natural rubber pacifiers do, they stretch out and need to be replaced over time- but they are still worth it. They come in great colors and for a great price too!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Only binky my boy will take!
reviews.reviewText: So my son is 4 months currently and this is the only binky he’ll take and LOVES it. That being said I bought multiple, however, once worn in a bit the nipple expands a ton!! Which is fine but my issue now is he will only take that one binky he’s worn in lol I’ve tried to give him another of the same kind but it’s just not the soft expanded one he’s come to love. Another mom I know said the same thing happened with her baby too! So although it’s a great binky and my son loves it, it’s odd that the nipple expands so much and therefore isn’t like the rest making it hard to go between different ones (again of the same kind). I’ve also tried stretching them myself and soaking them in hot water to see if I could mimic his favorite one but it didn’t work, he just needs to break in the others which I’m not sure he’ll care to do. Lastly, it’s easy to clean but gets water trapped inside the nipple which stinks but it dries out pretty quickly!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best Binkie (Pacifier) on the market.
reviews.reviewText: This is the only pacifier my little one will use. The nipple itself is soft, but the remaining is sturdy plastic. I thought they would wear out so I would have to buy more, but never had to. She would occasionally lose one. I bought 2 inexpensive paciefier holders that clip to her clothing. The shape of the Ritzy pacifiers make it easy to attach the holders. Win!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The only ones my baby will take!
reviews.reviewText: My baby loves these. They are the only ones he will keep in his mouth. All others he will just spit out. I love the shape and also how cute they look! We are definitely an Itzy Ritzy family!
Daughter loves em.don't like any other.Got them on sale but they are slightly pricy or hard to find!But worth it once found
only one accepted by the little boss!
We loves these pacifiers! They’re easy to wash, nice colours and most imply the baby loves them. They’re a great value and great quality.
My baby absolutely loves these pacifiers. They're light weight so don't drop so easily
